name: Coin Pusher (itch) (TypeAlpha)
description:
Spent a weekend making a simple coin pusher game in Godot 4.0, inspired by the coin pusher commonly found in game centers.

Spent time familiarizing myself with Blender exporting models to the Godot engine and the mapping process. Finally managed to come up with a barely playable version at the end of the weekend.

There may be a low frame rate when running in a browser, which will be alleviated as the coins settle down, but it is still recommended to download the Windows version for the best experience.

- - - 

花了一周末的时间用Godot4.0制作了一个简单的推币机游戏，灵感来自于游戏中心常见的推币机。

花时间熟悉了一下Blender导出模型到Godot引擎以及贴图的绘制流程。总算是在周末结束的时候拿出了一个勉强可玩的版本。

在浏览器中运行可能会出现帧率过低的情况，这个情况会随着硬币静止下来而缓解，不过还是推荐下载Windows版本来游玩以获得最佳体验。
